product_name: Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Half Cube
long_description: The Eagle Creek Pack-It(TM) Specter Half Cube offers a lightweight way to keep clothing and accessories organized when traveling-it's extremely light, translucent and water resistant. Eagle Creek Half Cube is great for T-shirts, pants, shorts and various necessities. Includes a quick-grab handle. Lightweight, ripstop, silicone-impregnated nylon resists weather and stains; translucent fabric allows visibility and quick identification of items inside.
short_description: The Eagle Creek Pack-It(TM) Specter Half Cube offers a lightweight way to keep clothing and accessories organized when traveling-it's extremely light, translucent and water resistant.
